speaker: agent
text: My name is [PERSON_NAME] and I was just wondering if you could give me a quote for some glass for my shower.

speaker: customer
text: Ma'am, is it like [MONEY_AMOUNT] like AOR a panel or something like that?

speaker: customer
text: We're converting our jacuzzi tub into a walk in shower.

speaker: agent
text: So I just want a half a glass, you know what I mean?

speaker: agent
text: The width of it is 4 foot 9 inches.

speaker: customer
text: At this point they are tearing it out and they're going to tile.

speaker: agent
text: So that's just a rough estessimate oay.

text: How tall were you wanting it?

text: Well, from floor to ceiling is 97 and a half inches.

text: Well, there's not really a standard.

speaker: agent
text: So it's really just your preference.

text: So generally what you would be possibly looking at is anywhere I would think between 800 to 1200, 1300, but I can't give you any exact pricing without exact measurements to be able to send over to my [OCCUPATION] to get quote oay.

text: So you're going, you want to frame it all out instead of just doing wall clamps?

text: Yes, I don't want the wall clamps.

text: I think the wall clamps would cost extra, wouldn't they?

text: Well, it would probably cost a little less depending on because you know, the more metal you use, the more costly it'll be.

speaker: agent
text: Okay, so I would consider wall clamps.

text: They're secured in there and their water sealed and all that stuff, correct?

speaker: agent
text: Do you know when you're going to have it tiled?

text: So the best way for me to do it really is to send somebody out there and get measurements.

speaker: agent
text: Let me look at my schedule real quick.

speaker: customer
text: I don't know how fast they get into it.

speaker: agent
text: But how long is turnaround time on the glass?

text: Well, once it's ordered it takes about [DURATION] [DURATION] to come in and then I am out generally about [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] and a house to get installed.

text: Okay, so from order, I mean you're looking anywhere between maybe [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION].
